question.query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y. FILTER(regex(?y,'Headington','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y0. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?z. FILTER(regex(?z,'garden','i')). FILTER(regex(?y0,'Wheatley','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y0. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?y. FILTER(regex(?y0,'Oxfordshire','i')). FILTER(regex(?y,'Victorian','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y. FILTER(regex(?y,'Old Marston','i')). }

question.string: houses in Summertown for less than 400000 pounds
question.query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?v ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?v <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#includes> ?x0. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y. ?v <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#hasPrice> ?y0. FILTER(?y0 < 400000). FILTER(regex(?y,'Summertown','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?z. FILTER(regex(?z,'electric heating','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?z. FILTER(regex(?z,'underfloor heating','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?z. FILTER(regex(?z,'wood floor','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?z. FILTER(regex(?z,'balcony','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?z. FILTER(regex(?z,'double glazed windows','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y. FILTER(regex(?y,'Rawlinson Road','i')). }

question.string: find a representative house in Summertown.
question.query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?y WHERE { ?y <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?y1. ?y <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y0. ?y rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. FILTER(regex(?y1,'representative','i')). FILTER(regex(?y0,'Summertown','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y. FILTER(regex(?y,'Botley Road','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y. FILTER(regex(?y,'Littlemore','i')). }

question.query:

SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?z. FILTER(regex(?z,'electric central heating system','i')). }

SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#description> ?z. FILTER(regex(?z,'courtyard','i')). }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?x0 WHERE { ?x0 rdf:type <http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/ontologies/real-estate#House>. ?x0 <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#street-address> ?y. FILTER(regex(?y,'Banbury Road','i')). }
